text:
<optional title, max 6 words>

Street performance, Katerina distressed, crowd gathered  
A moment of desperation  
Katerina: "Oh, what an unbearable child!"  
Katerina: "Cinq sous, cinq sous!"  
Policeman: "What do you want?"  

---  

Solid official approaches, sympathy in his eyes  
A gesture of kindness  
Official: "Here, take this."  
Katerina: "I thank you, honoured sir."  
Katerina: "You see, there are generous people."

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Katerina Ivanovna pleads for help and sympathy from a gentleman while facing trouble with a policeman during a public performance.
